testcase.name: Registering Valid New User Account
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Registration page..........................................passed When user select gender male................................................passed And user enters FirstName and Last Name.....................................passed And user selects date of birth..............................................passed And user enters valid email.................................................passed And user enters valid password..............................................passed And user clicks on Register Button..........................................passed Then Registration is Successful.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Scenario of Buying a Product and Confirming Order
testcase.system-out: Given User LogIn Valid......................................................passed When User Navigates to Performance PC Product Page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/digital-storm-vanquish-3-custom-performance-pc".passed And User Clicks on Add to Cart..............................................passed And User Clicks on Shopping Cart Icon.......................................passed And User Clicks on Checkout.................................................passed And User Enter Valid Credentials............................................passed And User Chooses Ground Shipping Method.....................................passed And User Chooses Check Payment Method.......................................passed And User Clicks On Continue in Payment Info Section.........................passed And User Clicks On Confirm Button...........................................passed Then Window is Redirected to Thank you Page.................................passed
